author: Surfers of Bali
text:
March doesn't normally delivery big swells, but that's not a problem for a place like Canggu.

There's plenty of small fun days in this area, often with light winds in the third month of the year.

Here's a compilation of several sessions we filmed in March 2021.

Get your free digital Bali Surf Guide here: https://surfersofbali.com/pages/bali-surf-guide

SUBSCRIBE for daily surf videos: https://bit.ly/2Tu1Poz

FIND US HERE
Website: https://surfersofbali.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/surfersof
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/surfersofbali

#SurfingBali #Canggu #SurfingIndonesia
description:
If you're interested in surfing in Bali you'll probably like this channel.

Our single session videos are supposed to make you feel like you're there, sitting on the beach watching it all happen.

We also have some interviews in the form of our #Beached series as well as some longer videos that run up to 2 hours

author: Variations 360
text:
Subway Surfers Breaks into Your House!

Other 360 videos here on the channel!
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLcZJzhCz108XoQ2aUD7gPNlBexTSSo8CJ

Thanks for being here!
#360 #vr #subwaysurfers #animation

author: Sky & Ocean
text:
I went with my crew to the Philippines to surf in Siargao!  We had so much fun hitting the waves, trying new foods, and spending so much time together!

Sky Brown will be the first Britain in more than 100 years to compete in two sports, in the upcoming Paris Olympics!

SHOP MY BOOK: http://bit.ly/SkysTheLimitBook

Speak another language? Help translate my video into your language! http://www.youtube.com/timedtext_cs_panel?c=UCjlQ_TVPXJFILEC7eANNGzg&tab=2

FOLLOW US!
Instagram: @skybrown @oceanbrown
Twitter: @skyandocean_
Facebook: @awsmkids
TikTok: @SkyBrown

Speak another language? Help me translate my videos into your language!
http://www.youtube.com/timedtext_cs_panel?c=UCjlQ_TVPXJFILEC7eANNGzg&tab=2

Sky Brown represented Great Britain (UK) in the 2021 Tokyo Summer Olympics receiving a Bronze medal; she was truly skating for the world. Sky hopes to continue making history while inspiring young girls and women across the world to reach for their dreams and become unstoppable. Sky also got a Gold Medal or first place in the 2021 X Games event.

Sky and Ocean post weekly vlogs on their YouTube channel, following their lives as skaters and surfers. When they’re not skating at the the skatepark or ripping waves in the ocean, they are using their platform to empower kids around the world through education and sports. Sky is an ambassador for Skateistan, Laureus, and has worked with many local organizations as well.

Sky won Dancing with the Stars Juniors, and has appeared with her brother on Little Big Shots, The Drew Barrymore Show, Kelly Clarkson show, Good Morning America GMA, Today Show, amongst many other press outlets. Sky has placed top 3 in global skateboarding and surfing contests including Dew Tour, Stab High, STU, ISO World Championships, amongst many others.

#skybrown #olympics #skyandocean #skater
description:
SHOP: http://linktr.ee/skybrown

FOLLOW US!
Instagram: @skybrown @oceanbrown
TikTok: @SkyBrown
Twitter: @skyandocean_
Facebook: @awsmkids

Sky Brown is a record-breaking skateboarder and a true inspiration for the next generation on and off the skatepark. In 2020 at the Tokyo Summer Olympics, Brown competed as part of the Great Britain team at only 13 years of age. She not only did she made history as the youngest ever Great Britain Olympian participating in the Summer Olympics, but she also won the bronze medal.

Sky is also the first female to land a frontside 540 figure. In 2022, Sky won gold in Women’s Skateboard Park at the X Games, known as the biggest worldwide skate competition.  In 2023, Sky took gold in World Championships, granting her her first World Champion title. 

#skybrown #olympics #skyandocean #skater #parisolympics
